package.name: appl
package.description: APPL is a C++ implementation of the SARSOP algorithm, using the factored MOMDP representation. It takes as input a POMDP model in the POMDP or POMDPX file format and produces a policy file. It also contains a simple simulator for evaluating the quality of the computed policy.
package.maintainer: Motion Modeling, Analysis, and Planning Lab
